Range.Text: range of cells to be evaluated
Range.Notes: Anywhere a range can be entered, a tablename is also allowed

Criteria.Text: can be a value or a logical rVal expression
Criteria.Note: criteria can be a literal value, expression, or ...

Sum_range.Text: range of values to be summed, if not present, Range is used.

Lookup_value.Note: b. Type a formula to reference the Base Monthly Salary amount as the lookup_value.

Table_array.Notes: Anywhere a range can be entered, a tablename is also allowed

Col_index_num.Text: number representing column to be retrieved

Value_if_true.Notes: returns boolean value if none given

Value_if_false.Notes: returns boolean value if none given
